banner.title: Bu vebsayt kukilərdən istifadə edir.
banner.description: Təsdiq qutularından istifadə edərək məlumatlarınızın göstərilən məqsədlərlə istifadə olunmasına razı olduğunuzu göstərin.

strictly_necessary.name: Mütləq Zəruri Kukilər
strictly_necessary.description: Bu kukilər veb saytın düzgün işləməsi üçün vacibdir. Sessiya idarəetməsi, təhlükəsizlik, forma doldurma və dil seçimləri kimi funksiyalar bu kukilərə əsaslanır. Bu kukilər olmadan sayt düzgün işləyə bilməz və deaktiv edilə bilməz.

performance.name: Performans və Analitika Kukiləri
performance.description: Bu kukilər veb saytımızın performansını ölçməyə və yaxşılaşdırmağa kömək edir. Hansı səhifələrin daha çox ziyarət edildiyini və istifadəçilərin saytda necə hərəkət etdiyini anonim şəkildə analiz edir.

targeting.name: Hədəfləmə və Reklam Kukiləri
targeting.description: Bu kukilər sizə uyğun məzmun və maraqlarınıza əsaslanan reklamlar təqdim etmək üçün istifadə olunur. Eyni reklamın təkrar göstərilməsinin qarşısını alır və reklam kampaniyalarının effektivliyini ölçür.

functionality.name: Funksionallıq Kukiləri
functionality.description: Bu kukilər istifadəçi təcrübəsini yaxşılaşdırmaq üçün istifadə olunur. Sessiyada edilən seçimləri, dil və region ayarlarını yadda saxlayaraq daha fərdi təcrübə təqdim edir.

third_party.name: Üçüncü Tərəf Kukiləri
third_party.description: Bu kukilər YouTube videoları, xəritə əlavələri və ya sosial media paylaşma düymələri kimi xarici xidmət təminatçıları tərəfindən yerləşdirilir. Onlar digər saytlarla qarşılıqlı əlaqənizə əsasən məlumat toplaya bilər.

debug.name: Tərtibatçı və Diaqnostika Kukiləri
debug.description: Bu kukilər yalnız sistem administratorları və ya tərtibatçılar tərəfindən istifadə olunur. Sayt xətalarını təhlil etmək və sistem davranışını analiz etmək üçün müvəqqəti aktiv edilə bilər.

about_us.label: AZAbout us
about_us.heading: AZYOLLDA IS YOUR PARTNER ON EVERY JOURNEY.
about_us.description: AZWe're empowering drivers and communities with on-demand towing, tire repairs, battery boosts, and fuel delivery—making streets safer, smoother, and more people-friendly.

earn_with_section.heading: AZEarn with Yollda
earn_with_section.description: AZJoin thousands of partners who earn by keeping drivers on the move—tow‑truck operators (car & freight), tire techs, battery specialists, fuel couriers, and fleet owners.

description.top: AZYou tap, help comes. Can’t tap? We’ve got you.
description.middle: AZIf your phone detects a crash and there’s no response, Yollda sends a help request on your behalf — instantly.
description.bottom: AZHad a breakdown or accident? Tap for help and nearby Yollda users will be alerted immediately

how_partner_section.heading: AZHow Yollda Partner Works
how_partner_section.description: AZDownload Yollda Partner app for Appstore or Playstore, create account use your car and driver by yourself. Get ride and earn more money

step1.title: AZGo online
step1.description: AZOpen the app and go online to start receiving service requests in your area.

step2.title: AZAccept a request
step2.description: AZReview incoming service details and tap to accept when you're ready.

step3.title: AZProvide Assistance
step3.description: AZDrive to the customer and provide the selected roadside assistance.

step4.title: AZEarn and track income
step4.description: AZGet paid quickly and monitor your earnings through the app dashboard.

revenue_section.heading: AZMAKE EVERY ROAD
revenue_section.description: AZJoin a growing network of service pros who keep drivers safe and moving. Earn on your schedule by providing essential roadside help where it matters most.

benefit1.title: AZEarn when you want dfsf sdf sdf dsfs sdfdsf
benefit1.description: AZSupport drivers during breakdowns, flat tires, and fuel needs. Work weekends or evenings — it's your call.

benefit2.title: AZWeekly payouts
benefit2.description: AZWe pay you every week. No upfront fees, no subscriptions — just a fair commission on each completed job.

benefit3.title: AZA steady flow of service requests
benefit3.description: AZEarn consistently by helping drivers with Yollda's steady flow of assistance service requests.

partner_section.heading: AZGet started as
partner_section.description: AZWhether you're an individual specialist or manage a fleet, Yollda lets you earn by providing essential roadside assistance — on your own time. Support drivers when they need it most.

benefit1.title: AZFill in the application
benefit1.description: AZChoose your city, share your contact details and service type. We’ll guide you through the next steps.

benefit2.title: AZUpload your documents
benefit2.description: AZSubmit required documents like your ID, driver’s license, and service-related permits.

benefit3.title: AZGet approved and start
benefit3.description: AZOnce your documents are verified, you’ll get access to the app and can start accepting service requests.

faq_section.newsletter_description: AZSubscribe to our newsletter and be the first to receive insights, updates, and expert tips on optimizing your financial management.
faq_section.thank_you_description: AZYou'll receive our latest insights, updates, and expert tips on optimizing your financial management.

faq_items.question: AZHow much does Bolt Drive cost? Do I need to pay for fuel?
faq_items.answer: AZBolt Drive pricing varies by location and vehicle type. You typically pay a daily rate plus mileage. Fuel costs are usually included in the rental price, but this can vary by location. Check the app for specific pricing in your area.

faq_items.question: AZHow do I unlock a Bolt Drive car?
faq_items.answer: AZTo unlock a Bolt Drive car, simply open the Bolt app, locate your reserved vehicle on the map, and tap the 'Unlock' button when you're near the car. The doors will unlock automatically via the app's connectivity.

faq_items.question: AZWhere do I find the car keys?
faq_items.answer: AZBolt Drive cars don't use traditional keys. The vehicle is unlocked and started through the Bolt app on your smartphone. Once unlocked, you can start the engine using the start button inside the vehicle.

faq_items.question: AZHow do I pay for Yollda Drive?
faq_items.answer: AZPayment for Yollda Drive is processed automatically through the payment method linked to your account. You'll be charged based on your usage time and distance traveled. All payments are handled securely through the app.

faq_items.question: AZWhat kind of cars can I rent with Yollda Partner?
faq_items.answer: AZAll of our cars come with automatic transmission at no extra cost. The specific make and model of hire car depends on availability. Our car types include: small, electric, medium-sized, and premium cars, as well as SUVs and vans. Check the app to see which cars are available to rent nearby.

faq_items.question: AZWhat are the age requirements for renting?
faq_items.answer: AZYou must be at least 21 years old to rent a vehicle through Yollda. Some premium vehicles may require you to be 25 or older. A valid driver's license is required for all rentals.

faq_items.question: AZCan I extend my rental period?
faq_items.answer: AZYes, you can extend your rental period through the app if the vehicle is available. Additional charges will apply based on the extended time and mileage.

faq_items.question: AZWhat happens if I have an accident?
faq_items.answer: AZIn case of an accident, immediately contact emergency services if needed, then report the incident through the app. Our 24/7 support team will guide you through the process and arrange assistance.
